ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] reason for guise of the deceiver to come off?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m not supposed to provide spoiler information for items my guild finds, so I can t provide details.  I will say this though: it seems to be the rare
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 4 May 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:

> Dont know any more than that. One dropped on innoruuk - someone from
> miriana's guild got it (wtg Romtom!). nice thing is that it seems to be
> trade-able (ie not no-drop.)
>

I'm not supposed to provide spoiler information for items my guild
finds, so I can't provide details. I will say this though: it seems to be
the rare drop, so be prepared for a long camp :(.
But yes, it's not no drop, so you can pass it around and have all
the rogues and bards in the group in illusion form.

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
